entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 32. Wind chill near minus 38. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Light snow. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Light snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas late in the evening and overnight. Amount 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming northeast 30 gusting to 50 in the evening then becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 23 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023
